prompts: Create a large ice-type Pokemon with a rugged, blocky appearance and a snowy texture.
Generate a creature resembling a massive ice sculpture, with hints of purple accents.
Design a Pokemon that looks like an iceberg on four legs, perfect for snowy habitats.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of glaciers, with a strong and sturdy build.
Show me a Pokemon that appears to be made of ice, with a crystalline body and unique shapes.
Make a Pokemon with a thick, icy body and a majestic, frozen aesthetic.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that seems to be carved from ice itself, with a powerful stance.

distinctive_features: Large, flat top reminiscent of an iceberg
